statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "Claude"'); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // "~"' | sed 's|.*/||'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); total_in=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0'); total_out=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // 0'); if [ -n "$used" ]; then printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m | \033[2m%s\033[0m | \033[2mContext: %.1f%% used (%.1f%% free) | Total: %dk in / %dk out\033[0m" "$model" "$dir" "$used" "$remaining" "$((total_in / 1000))" "$((total_out / 1000))"; else printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m | \033[2m%s\033[0m | \033[2mContext: initializing...\033[0m" "$model" "$dir"; fi
